title: Lollipop compatibility?
comment: Since upgrading to android 5.1 the app has had trouble with airplane mode. I use a tasker script to toggle airplane mode while at work as I have poor signal. During times when airplane mode is on the app seems to not be able to alter the wifi state. Have you seen similar problems? Would debug logs be of any use to you in solving this?

title: Does what it say
comment: Only trouble is all wifi toggling apps seem to break the wifi status icon! :(  Galaxy 2s.  However it has solved my battery drain problem on my galaxy 2s good job. :)  EDIT: Latest update is broken. DO NOT UPDATE until this is fixed. (Program crashes when foreground is ended) If you update you can get the older version from the developer's website. EDIT 2: Thanks for replying - do you have any idea about the crashing on 8.1 compared with 8.0? To reproduce - launch app, minimise it, close it, reopen.

The problem with the wifi in the status bar is due to the android framework not always updating the state properly. It is dependng on the framework/Android version and there is unfortunately not much that can be done about it

title: Keeping shutting down my WiFi
comment: I uninstalled it after I couldn't get it to work on my Nexus 7. Believe me, I tried almost all possible settings and my Nexus keep turning off its WiFi every 30 seconds. The strange thing is this app only works for the 1st 24 hours after installation. I know I should contact the developer to get things sorted out, but I also believe a well tested app should also work on its default settings on most popular devices.

title: Happier than before!
comment: I installed the app yesterday. I had it set for 30 seconds to turn off the screen which was also set to turn off Wifi. Turning it back on showed Wifi was OFF and started right back up without a hitch. It worked every time I tried it (about 15-20 times spanning a few seconds to several minutes). The tablet ON/OFF button (to force it ON/OFF) worked all but once where it wouldn't go back on so I had to start from a fresh boot. I really like the auto-ON/OFF function and hopefully the ON/OFF power button straightens itself out. Kudos to the Developer in providing so many options and a clean interface! Haven't determined if I am saving battery yet but will monitor it in the next several days.

title: Excelent app
comment: Switching wifi off with my screen, without the app my galaxy s3 and galaxy tab wount. Thanks!

title: Wow
comment: Thank you so much for this! Works perfectly. The built in android app controls sometimes leave wifi on for 20-30 minutes even with it set to never...all better now.

comment: I've had it for 1 day, but it's apparently helping Google Music overcome its buggy network connection, which made the player freeze constantly. Fingers crossed that it keeps working! Thanks!

title: This is the best wifi tool ever

title: What an Awesome App
comment: Just simply wonderful.  I feel so strongly about this being such a solid application that I just had to make writing a review a top priority.  .  I use this application on my Samsung Galaxy Music Player 5.0 and it simply works.  I like that it has regular settings and expert settings toggling.  I have not had any issue with the app at all.  I can't believe that the developer is giving it away free of charge.  I would say that this Application has doubled my battery life on the Samsung product since the app's real value comes when the device is idle and the screen is off as it does not use any wifi during that period unless it is plugged in or the user set the device to use wifi when the screen is off.  I am so impressed by the app that I have now installed it on my HP Touchpad which is also running Android ICS.    The only thing that I would changes is the ability to have a setting to have the device wake up at specified intervals say 30, 45 minutes for push notifications perhaps.  I also noticed that when Streaming Spotify with the screen off the music will stop even though there is at least 1KB of data acitivity which can be set in user threshold preferences.    Simply A++++++

title: Just what i was looking for...
comment: Excellent app! Plus  Devs are listening to our feedback.

title: Wow!
comment: Lately my Samsung Galaxy S2 (ICS 4.04) was having severe battery drain issues. I installed this app at 10am this morning, and at 6:17pm same day and with light use, it is still at 21 percent!  Normally the battery would completely drain by 1 or 2pm.  Awesome app!
